Function reference

Workflow helpers

Other tools for streamlining work

draft_pdf() draft_word()
Create a .Rmd draft using Schola templates
gd_download_folder()
Download files from Google Drive folder
manage_docx_header_logos()
Add or replace logo in the header of a Word document

Making charts

Tools for making charts in ggplot2

flush_axis
A shorcut for making axis text flush with axis
theme_schola()
A Schola Empirica ggplot2 theme

Report templates and output

Rmarkdown templates, output formats and helpers

copy_schola_template()
Copy default Schola template into project directory
open_schola_template()
Locate and open default Schola templates
schola_pdf()
Schola Empirica PDF Format
schola_word()
Basic Schola Empirica Word document
schola_word2()
Schola Empirica Word document with customisable template

Font helpers and shortcuts

Tools for installing, setting and using fonts contained in reschola

import_fonts()
Import Ubuntu fonts for use in charts and in the PDF reports
install_reschola_fonts()
Install reschola fonts on your computer
register_reschola_fonts()
Register reschola fonts on Windows
use_reschola_fonts() set_reschola_ggplot_fonts()
Make ggplot2 use font(s) in text-based geoms

LimeSurvey API functions

reschola’s own API to LimeSurvey with useful shortcuts

ls_add_participants()
Add Participant(s) to the Survey
ls_call()
Call LimeSurvey API Directly
ls_export()
Export Responses with Participants Attached
ls_get_attrs()
Get Survey Attributes in Semantic Form
ls_invite()
Invite Participant(s)
ls_login()
Login to LimeSurvey API
ls_participants()
List Participants
ls_responses()
Export Responses
ls_set_participant_properties()
Set or Edit Attribute(s) of an Participant
ls_surveys()
List All Surveys at the Server

All functions alphabetically

All functions, including uncategorised ones

as_czech_date()
Make Date of Class czech_date
compile_and_open()
Safely Compile RMarkdown Document(s)

Copy default Schola template into project directory

Czech Date Interval
dict_from_data()
Get item code-label dictionary from data
draft_pdf() draft_word()
Create a .Rmd draft using Schola templates
fct_nanify()
NAnify factor level
flush_axis
A shorcut for making axis text flush with axis

Download files from Google Drive folder

Register reschola fonts on Windows
remove_empty_at()
Remove rows empty only at specified columns
scale_x_percent_cz() scale_y_percent_cz() scale_x_number_cz() scale_y_number_cz()
Continuous scales with Czech percent labels
schola_barplot()
Plot standard Schola likert-like barplot with groupwise comparison per items
schola_labeller()
Labeller with width wrapping and item code-label dictionary
schola_pdf()
Schola Empirica PDF Format

Transform to STEN score (Standard Ten)

A Schola Empirica ggplot2 theme
